Corkscrew as a plant holder: Use a corkscrew to hold soil and plants in a small pot or container.
Corkscrew as a bookmark: Use a corkscrew to mark your place in a book or journal.
Corkscrew as a phone stand: Use a corkscrew to prop up your phone or tablet on a desk or table.
Corkscrew as a candle holder: Use a corkscrew to hold a candle or tealight in a holder.
Corkscrew as a coat hanger: Use a corkscrew to hang a coat or scarf on a wall.
